readme:
# Clinical Metaproteomics 4: Quantitation

Quantitative proteomics is crucial for many important purposes. It allows researchers to measure and compare the levels of proteins or peptides in biological samples. This provides valuable insights into biomarker discovery, comparative analysis, and differential expression studies. Quantitative proteomics also helps in understanding the functional roles of proteins, the composition of protein complexes, and the effects of drugs on protein expression in pharmacological studies. Additionally, it serves as a quality control measure by validating initial protein identifications and providing data normalization for increased accuracy. The quantitative data are essential for hypothesis testing, and systems biology, and have clinical relevance in areas such as disease diagnosis, prognosis, and therapeutic decision-making. In summary, the quantitation workflow in proteomics is essential for understanding the complexities of protein expression and regulation, and it facilitates a wide range of biological and clinical applications.

In this current workflow, we perform Quantification using the MaxQuant tool. A GTN has been developed for this workflow.
https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/proteomics/tutorials/clinical-mp-4-quantitation/tutorial.html

## Inputs dataset

- `RAW MSMS datasets` in RAW dataset collection 
- `Quantitation_Database_for_MaxQuant` in Fasta (protein sequences for database searching)
- `Experimental-Design Discovery MaxQuant` in Tabular Format 

## Inputs values

For MaxQuant 
- Peptide Length
- Variable modifications
- Labeled element


## Processing

- extract microbial proteins and peptides using Select and Cut
- Grouping duplicates using the Group tool

# Changelog


## [0.1] - 2024-08-14

- Initial version of Clinical Metaproteomics 4: Quantitation
diagram_svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 920 460" role="img" aria-label="Clinical Metaproteomics Quantitation workflow diagram">
  <title>Clinical Metaproteomics Quantitation</title>
  <desc>TMT-based quantitation workflow for clinical metaproteomics: MaxQuant database search with TMT 11-plex labeling, extraction of microbial proteins and peptides, and grouping for quantification</desc>
  <defs>
    <pattern id="grid" width="20" height="20" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 20 0 L 0 0 0 20" fill="none" stroke="#c5d5e4" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    <pattern id="grid-major" width="100" height="100" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="url(#grid)"/>
      <path d="M 100 0 L 0 0 0 100" fill="none" stroke="#b0c4d8" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    <style>
      .connection { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 4; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .connection-qc { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 5 3; }
      .connection-secondary { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .node-card { filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)); }
    </style>
  </defs>
  <rect width="920" height="460" fill="#f8f9fa"/>
  <rect width="920" height="460" fill="url(#grid-major)"/>
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="920" height="45" fill="#25537b"/>
  <text x="20" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="16" font-weight="600" fill="white">Clinical Metaproteomics Quantitation</text>
  <text x="900" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)" text-anchor="end">clinicalMP</text>

  <!-- CONNECTIONS -->
  <!-- Database -> MaxQuant -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 180 100 C 230 100, 280 140, 300 140"/>
  <!-- Design -> MaxQuant -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 180 190 C 230 190, 280 155, 300 155"/>
  <!-- Raw files -> MaxQuant -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 180 280 C 230 280, 280 170, 300 170"/>
  <!-- MaxQuant -> Extract Microbial Proteins -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 500 140 C 530 140, 540 120, 560 120"/>
  <!-- MaxQuant -> Extract Microbial Peptides -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 500 165 C 530 165, 540 210, 560 210"/>
  <!-- Extract Proteins -> Group Proteins -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 760 120 C 790 120, 795 110, 810 110"/>
  <!-- Extract Peptides -> Group Peptides -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 760 210 C 790 210, 795 200, 810 200"/>

  <!-- INPUT: Protein Database -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(20,65)">
    <rect width="160" height="70" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="160" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="160" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="80" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">Protein Database</text>
    <text x="80" y="50" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057" text-anchor="middle">For MaxQuant search</text>
    <circle cx="160" cy="35" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- INPUT: Experimental Design -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(20,155)">
    <rect width="160" height="70" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="160" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="160" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="80" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">Experimental Design</text>
    <text x="80" y="50" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057" text-anchor="middle">MaxQuant design file</text>
    <circle cx="160" cy="35" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- INPUT: Raw Files -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(20,245)">
    <rect width="160" height="70" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="160" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="160" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="80" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">Raw MS Files</text>
    <text x="80" y="50" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057" text-anchor="middle">Thermo RAW collection</text>
    <circle cx="160" cy="35" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- PROCESSING: MaxQuant -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(300,110)">
    <rect width="200" height="80" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">MaxQuant</text>
    <text x="100" y="48" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057" text-anchor="middle">Database search with</text>
    <text x="100" y="61" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057" text-anchor="middle">TMT 11-plex quantitation</text>
    <text x="100" y="74" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">match between runs enabled</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- PROCESSING: Extract Microbial Proteins -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(560,90)">
    <rect width="200" height="60" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Filter Microbial Proteins</text>
    <text x="100" y="50" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057" text-anchor="middle">Remove human/contaminants</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="30" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="30" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- PROCESSING: Extract Microbial Peptides -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(560,180)">
    <rect width="200" height="60" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Filter Microbial Peptides</text>
    <text x="100" y="50" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057" text-anchor="middle">Remove human/contaminants</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="30" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="30" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- OUTPUT: Quantified Proteins -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(800,85)">
    <rect width="110" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="110" height="24" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="12" width="110" height="12" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="55" y="16" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Quant Proteins</text>
    <text x="55" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#495057" text-anchor="middle">grouped tabular</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="6" fill="#f97316" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- OUTPUT: Quantified Peptides -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(800,175)">
    <rect width="110" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="110" height="24" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="12" width="110" height="12" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="55" y="16" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Quant Peptides</text>
    <text x="55" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#495057" text-anchor="middle">grouped tabular</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="6" fill="#f97316" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- LEGEND -->
  <g transform="translate(20,410)">
    <rect width="880" height="36" rx="6" fill="white" fill-opacity="0.85" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="15" y="10" width="16" height="16" rx="3" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="38" y="23" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Input</text>
    <line x1="90" y1="18" x2="130" y2="18" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <text x="138" y="23" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Data flow</text>
    <line x1="210" y1="18" x2="250" y2="18" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-dasharray="5 3"/>
    <text x="258" y="23" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">QC flow</text>
    <rect x="330" y="10" width="16" height="16" rx="3" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="353" y="23" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Output</text>
    <rect x="410" y="10" width="16" height="16" rx="3" fill="#10b981"/>
    <text x="433" y="23" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Report / QC</text>
    <rect x="520" y="10" width="16" height="16" rx="3" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="543" y="23" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Processing</text>
  </g>
</svg>
